TextLibrary.Text: Thank you for restoring our statue. We are in your debt.
Thank you for restoring our statue. We are in your debt.
It was the least we could do after... well... you know...
It was the least we could do after... well... you know...

It was an honest mistake, and the priests do not need to hear of it. The statue has now been to the cradle of our religion, and dipped in the life-giving waters of Plasmia. It is ready to return home.
